motivation.quote: Push yourself, because no one else will.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
motivation.author: Sean Patrick Flanery

motivation.quote: Little things make big days.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
motivation.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
motivation.author: Walt Disney

motivation.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
motivation.author: John D. Rockefeller

motivation.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
motivation.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
motivation.author: Will Rogers

motivation.quote: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you. Failure builds character.
motivation.author: Unknown

motivation.quote: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.quote: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
motivation.author: Rob Siltanen

motivation.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
motivation.author: Og Mandino

motivation.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
motivation.author: Maya Angelou

motivation.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.
motivation.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

motivation.quote: Imagine your life is perfect in every respect; what would it look like?
motivation.author: Brian Tracy

motivation.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
motivation.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivation.quote: Do what you can with all you have, wherever you are.
motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivation.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
motivation.author: George Eliot

motivation.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
motivation.author: Jim Rohn

motivation.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
motivation.author: Henry Ford

motivation.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
motivation.author: Mark Twain

motivation.quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it.
motivation.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

motivation.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
motivation.author: Frank Sinatra

motivation.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
motivation.author: Charles R. Swindoll

motivation.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
motivation.author: Amelia Earhart

motivation.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
motivation.author: Christian D. Larson

motivation.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
motivation.author: Billie Jean King

motivation.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but action in spite of it.
motivation.author: Mark Twain

motivation.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivation.author: Sam Levenson

motivation.quote: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
motivation.author: George Addair

motivation.quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
motivation.author: Japanese Proverb

motivation.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
motivation.author: Henry David Thoreau

motivation.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
motivation.author: C.S. Lewis

motivation.quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
motivation.author: Jimmy Dean

motivation.quote: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
motivation.author: Nelson Mandela

motivation.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
motivation.author: Walt Whitman

motivation.quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
motivation.author: Neale Donald Walsch

motivation.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
motivation.author: Jim Ryun

motivation.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
motivation.author: Earl Nightingale

motivation.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
motivation.author: Chris Grosser

motivation.quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
motivation.author: Walter Elliot

motivation.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
motivation.author: Aristotle

motivation.quote: Risk more than others think is safe. Dream more than others think is practical.
motivation.author: Claude T. Bissell

motivation.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
motivation.author: Albert Einstein

motivation.quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
motivation.author: Jimmy Johnson

motivation.quote: The future depends on what you do today.
motivation.author: Mahatma Gandhi

motivation.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivation.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
motivation.author: Colin R. Davis

motivation.quote: The successful warrior is the average man with laser-like focus.
motivation.author: Bruce Lee

motivation.quote: There is no elevator to success. You have to take the stairs.
motivation.author: Zig Ziglar

motivation.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
motivation.author: Oprah Winfrey

motivation.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
motivation.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivation.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
motivation.author: C.S. Lewis

motivation.quote: Your only limit is your mind.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivation.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivation.quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, and intelligent execution.
motivation.author: Aristotle

motivation.quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
motivation.author: Tim Ferriss

motivation.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
motivation.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivation.quote: Hustle until your haters ask if you're hiring.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
motivation.author: Winston Churchill

motivation.quote: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was ending, he turned into a butterfly.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
motivation.author: Mark Twain

motivation.quote: Life is tough, but so are you.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
motivation.author: John Wooden

motivation.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
motivation.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivation.quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.
motivation.author: Pablo Picasso

motivation.quote: Progress, not perfection.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Quit making excuses. What we really need is to take responsibility for our choices and actions.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
motivation.author: Dalai Lama

motivation.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
motivation.author: Arthur Ashe

motivation.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
motivation.author: Chinese Proverb

motivation.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivation.author: Steve Jobs

motivation.quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
motivation.author: Bill Bradley

motivation.quote: Be yourself, everyone else is already taken.
motivation.author: Oscar Wilde

motivation.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
motivation.author: Joshua J. Marine

motivation.quote: Don't limit your challenges, challenge your limits.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
motivation.author: Benjamin Franklin

motivation.quote: Fortune favors the bold.
motivation.author: Latin Proverb

motivation.quote: Goals are dreams with deadlines.
motivation.author: Diana Scharf Hunt

motivation.quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
motivation.author: Jim Rohn

motivation.quote: If you want something you've never had, you must be willing to do something you've never done.
motivation.author: Thomas Jefferson

motivation.quote: Just do it.
motivation.author: Nike

motivation.quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself.
motivation.author: Gail Devers

motivation.quote: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.
motivation.author: Grandma Moses

motivation.quote: Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable.
motivation.author: Brian Tracy

motivation.quote: Never give up on something that you can't go a day without thinking about.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will be drawn to you.
motivation.author: Mary Lou Retton

motivation.quote: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Quit making excuses. What we really need is to take responsibility for our choices.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Results happen over time, not overnight. Work hard, stay consistent, and be patient.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Success is not about the destination, it's about the journey and who you become along the way.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Understand that failure is an event, not a person.
motivation.author: Zig Ziglar

motivation.quote: Victory is reserved for those who are willing to pay its price.
motivation.author: Sun Tzu

motivation.quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win.
motivation.author: Vince Lombardi

motivation.quote: You don't have to be perfect, you just have to be better than you were yesterday.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Zest for life is contagious. Surround yourself with people who inspire you.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
motivation.author: Pablo Picasso

motivation.quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
motivation.author: Peter T. Mcintyre

motivation.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
motivation.author: Jim Rohn

motivation.quote: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Fear has two meanings: 'Forget Everything and Run' or 'Face Everything and Rise.' The choice is yours.
motivation.author: Zig Ziglar

motivation.quote: Great things happen to those who don't stop believing, trying, learning, and being grateful.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent fails to work hard.
motivation.author: Kevin Durant

motivation.quote: If you're not willing to risk the usual, you'll have to settle for the ordinary.
motivation.author: Jim Rohn

motivation.quote: Just because you took longer than others doesn't mean you failed.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Keep going. Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life.
motivation.author: Roy T. Bennett

motivation.quote: Life begins where your comfort zone ends.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Motivation gets you started. Habit keeps you going.
motivation.author: Jim Ryun

motivation.quote: Never underestimate the power of dreams and the influence of the human spirit.
motivation.author: Wilma Rudolph

motivation.quote: Opportunities are like sunrises. If you wait too long, you miss them.
motivation.author: William Arthur Ward

motivation.quote: Persistence can change failure into extraordinary achievement.
motivation.author: Matt Biondi

motivation.quote: Quitting is never an option on the road to success.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Remember why you started.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Success is not just about accomplishing your goals, but about who you become in the process.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
motivation.author: Tony Robbins

motivation.quote: Unleash your potential. You have more power than you think.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: Visualize your highest self, then start showing up as that person.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: When you feel like quitting, think about why you started.
motivation.author: Anonymous

motivation.quote: You are capable of amazing things.
motivation.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Teaching is the profession that creates all others.
teachers.author: Unknown

teachers.quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
teachers.author: Brad Henry

teachers.quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
teachers.author: Mark Van Doren

teachers.quote: Teaching kids to count is fine, but teaching them what counts is best.
teachers.author: Bob Talbert

teachers.quote: The best teachers are those who show you where to look but don't tell you what to see.
teachers.author: Alexandra K. Trenfor

teachers.quote: A teacher affects eternity; he can never tell where his influence stops.
teachers.author: Henry Adams

teachers.quote: Teaching is not a lost art, but the regard for it is a lost tradition.
teachers.author: Jacques Barzun

teachers.quote: The mediocre teacher tells. The good teacher explains. The superior teacher demonstrates. The great teacher inspires.
teachers.author: William Arthur Ward

teachers.quote: Teaching is the greatest act of optimism.
teachers.author: Colleen Wilcox

teachers.quote: A teacher takes a hand, opens a mind, and touches a heart.
teachers.author: Unknown

teachers.quote: The influence of a good teacher can never be erased.
teachers.author: Unknown

teachers.quote: Teachers plant the seeds of knowledge that last a lifetime.
teachers.author: Unknown

teachers.quote: Teaching is a work of heart.
teachers.author: Unknown

teachers.quote: The best teachers teach from the heart, not from the book.
teachers.author: Unknown

teachers.quote: A teacher's purpose is not to create students in his own image, but to develop students who can create their own image.
teachers.author: Unknown

teachers.quote: What the teacher is, is more important than what he teaches.
teachers.author: Karl Menninger

teachers.quote: Teachers who love teaching teach children to love learning.
teachers.author: Robert John Meehan

teachers.quote: The dream begins with a teacher who believes in you.
teachers.author: Dan Rather

teachers.quote: Teaching is the only major occupation of man for which we have not yet developed tools that make an average person capable of competence and performance.
teachers.author: Peter Drucker

teachers.quote: A teacher is one who makes himself progressively unnecessary.
teachers.author: Thomas Carruthers

teachers.quote: The task of the modern educator is not to cut down jungles, but to irrigate deserts.
teachers.author: C.S. Lewis

teachers.quote: Good teaching is one-fourth preparation and three-fourths pure theatre.
teachers.author: Gail Godwin

teachers.quote: The authority of those who teach is often an obstacle to those who want to learn.
teachers.author: Cicero

teachers.quote: Teaching is the profession that teaches all the other professions.
teachers.author: Unknown

teachers.quote: A teacher's job is to take a bunch of live wires and see that they are well-grounded.
teachers.author: Darwin D. Martin

teachers.quote: The whole art of teaching is only the art of awakening the natural curiosity of young minds.
teachers.author: Anatole France

teachers.quote: Teachers open the door, but you must enter by yourself.
teachers.author: Chinese Proverb

teachers.quote: In teaching you cannot see the fruit of a day's work. It is invisible and remains so, maybe for twenty years.
teachers.author: Jacques Barzun

teachers.quote: Teaching is not about answering questions but about raising questions.
teachers.author: Unknown

teachers.quote: The best teachers are those who change their minds.
teachers.author: Terry Heick

teachers.quote: A teacher who is attempting to teach without inspiring the pupil with a desire to learn is hammering on cold iron.
teachers.author: Horace Mann

teachers.quote: The teacher who is indeed wise does not bid you to enter the house of his wisdom but rather leads you to the threshold of your mind.
teachers.author: Khalil Gibran

teachers.quote: Teaching is more than imparting knowledge, it is inspiring change.
teachers.author: William Arthur Ward

teachers.quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
teachers.author: Mark Van Doren

teachers.quote: A teacher's job is to take a bunch of live wires and see that they are well-grounded.
teachers.author: Darwin D. Martin

teachers.quote: Teaching should be full of ideas instead of stuffed with facts.
teachers.author: Unknown

teachers.quote: The good teacher explains. The superior teacher demonstrates. The great teacher inspires.
teachers.author: William Arthur Ward

teachers.quote: Teaching is not about answering questions but about raising questions.
teachers.author: Unknown

teachers.quote: A teacher's purpose is not to create students in his own image, but to develop students who can create their own image.
teachers.author: Unknown

teachers.quote: The teacher is the one who gets the most out of the lessons, and the true teacher is the learner.
teachers.author: Elbert Hubbard

teachers.quote: Education is not the filling of a bucket, but the lighting of a fire.
teachers.author: William Butler Yeats

teachers.quote: A teacher's greatest joy is seeing a student succeed.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Behind every successful person is a substantial amount of coffee and a great teacher.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Coffee and lesson plans: a teacher's survival kit.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Dear teacher, thank you for making learning an adventure.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Every child deserves a champion – an adult who will never give up on them.
teachers.author: Rita Pierson

teachers.quote: For every student who needs a teacher, there's a teacher who needs a student.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Great teachers empathize with kids, respect them, and believe that each one has something special that can be built upon.
teachers.author: Ann Lieberman

teachers.quote: Heroes don't always wear capes. Sometimes they teach.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: I touch the future. I teach.
teachers.author: Christa McAuliffe

teachers.quote: Just when you think you've taught them everything, they teach you something new.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Knowledge is power, but enthusiasm pulls the switch.
teachers.author: Ivern Ball

teachers.quote: Learning is not a spectator sport. Students must talk about what they are learning.
teachers.author: Arthur Chickering

teachers.quote: Most teachers have no idea of the impact they have on their students.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed teachers can change the world.
teachers.author: Margaret Mead

teachers.quote: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
teachers.author: Malala Yousafzai

teachers.quote: Patience is the teacher's greatest virtue.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Quality teaching is the bridge between where students are and where they need to be.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Real teachers are those who use themselves as bridges over which they invite their students to cross.
teachers.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

teachers.quote: Students don't care how much you know until they know how much you care.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: The best teachers are those who show you where to look, but don't tell you what to see.
teachers.author: Alexandra K. Trenfor

teachers.quote: The greatest sign of success for a teacher is to be able to say, 'The children are now working as if I did not exist.'
teachers.author: Maria Montessori

teachers.quote: The heart of teaching is the teaching of the heart.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: The important thing is not so much that every child should be taught, as that every child should be given the wish to learn.
teachers.author: John Lubbock

teachers.quote: The teacher who walks in the shadow of the temple, among his followers, gives not of his wisdom but rather of his faith and his lovingness.
teachers.author: Khalil Gibran

teachers.quote: There is no greater joy than seeing a student's face light up with understanding.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: To teach is to learn twice over.
teachers.author: Joseph Joubert

teachers.quote: Understanding is the key to effective teaching.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Variety is the spice of teaching.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: When you teach your son, you teach your son's son.
teachers.author: The Talmud

teachers.quote: You can't teach what you don't know, and you can't lead where you won't go.
teachers.author: Jesse Jackson

teachers.quote: A teacher's influence extends beyond the classroom and into eternity.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Being a teacher means being a lifelong learner.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun, and teachers are the facilitators of that fun.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Dedication, passion, and patience are the three pillars of great teaching.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Every teacher was once a student who decided to give back.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Flexibility in teaching methods leads to success in student learning.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Good teachers know how to bring out the best in students.
teachers.author: Charles Kuralt

teachers.quote: Hope is the foundation upon which all great teaching is built.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Inspiring students to reach their potential is the greatest gift a teacher can give.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Joy in teaching comes from seeing students discover their own capabilities.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Knowledge shared is knowledge multiplied.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Learning happens when teachers and students work together as partners.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Mentoring is the highest form of teaching.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: No teacher ever truly retires; they just stop getting paid for what they love to do.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Outstanding teachers go out of their way to boost a student's self-esteem.
teachers.author: Freeman Hrabowski III

teachers.quote: Passion for teaching is contagious and spreads to every student in the classroom.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Quality teaching requires both the heart of a servant and the mind of a scholar.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Remember that you are not just teaching a subject, you are teaching students.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Students may forget what you said, but they will never forget how you made them feel.
teachers.author: Carl W. Buehner

teachers.quote: The best teachers are those who never stop being students themselves.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Teaching is not about having all the answers, but about inspiring the right questions.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Understanding your students is the first step to effective teaching.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Variety in teaching methods keeps students engaged and learning.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: When a teacher believes in a student, that student begins to believe in themselves.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Your classroom is a garden where minds grow and flourish.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: A teacher's smile can light up a student's entire day.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Behind every great student is a teacher who believed in them first.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Creativity in the classroom opens doors to endless possibilities.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Differentiated instruction ensures every student can succeed.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Every student has a story. Great teachers take time to read it.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Flexibility in teaching is the key to reaching every learner.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Great teachers plant seeds of curiosity that bloom for a lifetime.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Humor in the classroom makes learning memorable and enjoyable.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Inspiring students to think critically is a teacher's greatest achievement.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Just as no two students are alike, no two lessons should be identical.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Kindness is the universal language that every student understands.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Learning happens when teachers create safe spaces for students to explore.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Mistakes in the classroom are opportunities for growth, not failure.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: No teacher ever truly knows the full impact of their influence.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Outstanding teachers see potential where others see problems.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Patience is not just a virtue for teachers; it's a necessity.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Questions from students are gifts that show they're thinking.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Respect in the classroom must be mutual between teacher and student.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Small moments of encouragement can have enormous impacts on students.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: The classroom is where futures are shaped and dreams take flight.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Understanding different learning styles helps teachers reach every student.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Vulnerability in teaching shows students it's okay to not know everything.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: When teachers stop learning, they stop being effective educators.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Your enthusiasm for your subject is contagious to your students.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: A teacher's legacy lives on in the minds they've touched.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Building relationships with students is the foundation of effective teaching.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Celebrating small victories in the classroom builds confidence in students.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Dedication to students goes far beyond the school day.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Every child deserves a teacher who believes in their potential.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Fostering independence in students is a teacher's ultimate goal.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Great teachers adapt their methods to meet their students' needs.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Hope is what teachers give to students who have lost their way.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Inclusive classrooms benefit every student, not just those with special needs.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Just one teacher can change the trajectory of a student's entire life.
teachers.author: Anonymous

teachers.quote: Knowledge shared with passion becomes wisdom in students' minds.

inspiration.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
inspiration.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspiration.quote: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
inspiration.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

inspiration.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
inspiration.author: Mae West

inspiration.quote: If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
inspiration.author: J.K. Rowling

inspiration.quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
inspiration.author: Mark Twain

inspiration.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
inspiration.author: Woodrow Wilson

inspiration.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
inspiration.author: Elbert Hubbard

inspiration.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people just exist.
inspiration.author: Oscar Wilde

inspiration.quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present.
inspiration.author: Bill Keane

inspiration.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
inspiration.author: Thomas A. Edison

inspiration.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
inspiration.author: Albert Einstein

inspiration.quote: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
inspiration.author: Chinese Proverb

inspiration.quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
inspiration.author: Roger Staubach

inspiration.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
inspiration.author: George Eliot

inspiration.quote: You become what you believe.
inspiration.author: Oprah Winfrey

inspiration.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
inspiration.author: Vincent van Gogh

inspiration.quote: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.
inspiration.author: Unknown

inspiration.quote: It is not what you do for your children, but what you have taught them to do for themselves, that will make them successful human beings.
inspiration.author: Ann Landers

inspiration.quote: If you want your children to turn out well, spend twice as much time with them, and half as much money.
inspiration.author: Abigail Van Buren

inspiration.quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
inspiration.author: Farrah Gray

inspiration.quote: The battles that count aren't the ones for gold medals. The struggles within yourself–the invisible battles inside all of us–that's where it's at.
inspiration.author: Jesse Owens

inspiration.quote: Education costs money. But then so does ignorance.
inspiration.author: Sir Claus Moser

inspiration.quote: Adventure is worthwhile in itself.
inspiration.author: Amelia Earhart

inspiration.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
inspiration.author: Dalai Lama

inspiration.quote: Creativity takes courage.
inspiration.author: Henri Matisse

inspiration.quote: Dreams don't work unless you do.
inspiration.author: John C. Maxwell

inspiration.quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
inspiration.author: T.S. Eliot

inspiration.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
inspiration.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

inspiration.quote: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: Hope is the thing with feathers that perches in the soul.
inspiration.author: Emily Dickinson

inspiration.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
inspiration.author: Albert Einstein

inspiration.quote: Joy is not in things; it is in us.
inspiration.author: Richard Wagner

inspiration.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
inspiration.author: Theodore Roosevelt

inspiration.quote: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
inspiration.author: Rumi

inspiration.quote: Magic happens when you don't give up.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
inspiration.author: Audrey Hepburn

inspiration.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement.
inspiration.author: Helen Keller

inspiration.quote: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
inspiration.author: Albert Einstein

inspiration.quote: Quiet minds cannot be perplexed or frightened but go on in fortune or misfortune at their own private pace.
inspiration.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

inspiration.quote: Resilience is accepting your new reality, even if it's less good than the one you had before.
inspiration.author: Elizabeth Edwards

inspiration.quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
inspiration.author: Leonardo da Vinci

inspiration.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
inspiration.author: Peter Drucker

inspiration.quote: Unity is strength... when there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved.
inspiration.author: Mattie Stepanek

inspiration.quote: Vulnerability is not weakness; it's our greatest measure of courage.
inspiration.author: Brené Brown

inspiration.quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
inspiration.author: Socrates

inspiration.quote: Xenial hospitality creates bonds that last a lifetime.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
inspiration.author: Wayne Gretzky

inspiration.quote: Zeal without knowledge is fire without light.
inspiration.author: Thomas Fuller

inspiration.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
inspiration.author: William James

inspiration.quote: Believe in miracles, but don't depend on them.
inspiration.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

inspiration.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
inspiration.author: Norman Vincent Peale

inspiration.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
inspiration.author: Muhammad Ali

inspiration.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer.
inspiration.author: Harriet Tubman

inspiration.quote: Forgiveness is not an occasional act, it is a constant attitude.
inspiration.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

inspiration.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
inspiration.author: Thomas Edison

inspiration.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
inspiration.author: Dalai Lama

inspiration.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
inspiration.author: Walt Disney

inspiration.quote: Just believe in yourself. Even if you don't, pretend that you do and, at some point, you will.
inspiration.author: Venus Williams

inspiration.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
inspiration.author: Helen Keller

inspiration.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
inspiration.author: Confucius

inspiration.quote: Miracles happen every day, change your perception of what a miracle is and you'll see them all around you.
inspiration.author: Jon Bon Jovi

inspiration.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
inspiration.author: Babe Ruth

inspiration.quote: Opportunities multiply as they are seized.
inspiration.author: Sun Tzu

inspiration.quote: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
inspiration.author: Elbert Hubbard

inspiration.quote: Quality is never an accident; it is always the result of intelligent effort.
inspiration.author: John Ruskin

inspiration.quote: Rise above the storm and you will find the sunshine.
inspiration.author: Mario Fernández

inspiration.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
inspiration.author: Winston Churchill

inspiration.quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
inspiration.author: Jordan Belfort

inspiration.quote: Understanding is the first step to acceptance, and only with acceptance can there be recovery.
inspiration.author: J.K. Rowling

inspiration.quote: Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.
inspiration.author: Napoleon Hill

inspiration.quote: What we think, we become.

inspiration.quote: Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records.
inspiration.author: William A. Ward

inspiration.quote: Be the reason someone smiles today.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the mastery of it.
inspiration.author: Mark Twain

inspiration.quote: Don't wait for the perfect moment. Take the moment and make it perfect.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: Every sunset brings the promise of a new dawn.
inspiration.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspiration.quote: Find joy in the ordinary moments.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
inspiration.author: Melody Beattie

inspiration.quote: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.
inspiration.author: Desmond Tutu

inspiration.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
inspiration.author: Albert Einstein

inspiration.quote: Joy is not in things; it is in us.
inspiration.author: Richard Wagner

inspiration.quote: Kindness is a gift everyone can afford to give.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you respond to it.
inspiration.author: Lou Holtz

inspiration.quote: Make today so awesome that yesterday gets jealous.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
inspiration.author: Aesop

inspiration.quote: Opportunities are like sunrises. If you wait too long, you miss them.
inspiration.author: William Arthur Ward

inspiration.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
inspiration.author: Buddha

inspiration.quote: Quality is never an accident; it is always the result of intelligent effort.
inspiration.author: John Ruskin

inspiration.quote: Rise above the storm and you will find the sunshine.
inspiration.author: Mario Fernández

inspiration.quote: Sometimes the smallest step in the right direction ends up being the biggest step of your life.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
inspiration.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspiration.quote: Unity is strength. When there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved.
inspiration.author: Mattie Stepanek

inspiration.quote: Vulnerability is not weakness; it's our greatest measure of courage.
inspiration.author: Brené Brown

inspiration.quote: When we focus on our gratitude, the tide of disappointment goes out and the tide of love rushes in.
inspiration.author: Kristin Armstrong

inspiration.quote: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
inspiration.author: A.A. Milne

inspiration.quote: Zeal without knowledge is fire without light.
inspiration.author: Thomas Fuller

inspiration.quote: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true.
inspiration.author: David Bailey

inspiration.quote: Believe something wonderful is about to happen.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: Choose to be optimistic. It feels better.
inspiration.author: Dalai Lama

inspiration.quote: Dreams are the seedlings of realities.
inspiration.author: James Allen

inspiration.quote: Every day is a new beginning. Take a deep breath and start again.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you can't see the whole staircase.
inspiration.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

inspiration.quote: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
inspiration.author: Dalai Lama

inspiration.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
inspiration.author: Booker T. Washington

inspiration.quote: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was ending, it turned into a butterfly.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.
inspiration.author: Walt Whitman

inspiration.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
inspiration.author: Albert Einstein

inspiration.quote: Miracles happen every day. Change your perception of what a miracle is and you'll see them all around you.
inspiration.author: Jon Bon Jovi

inspiration.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
inspiration.author: Earl Nightingale

inspiration.quote: One small positive thought can change your whole day.
inspiration.author: Anonymous

inspiration.quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
inspiration.author: Zig Ziglar

inspiration.quote: Quiet minds cannot be perplexed or frightened but go on in fortune or misfortune at their own private pace.
inspiration.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

inspiration.quote: Remember that happiness is a way of travel, not a destination.
inspiration.author: Roy M. Goodman

inspiration.quote: Smile, it's free therapy.
inspiration.author: Douglas Horton

inspiration.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
inspiration.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspiration.quote: Understanding is the first step to acceptance, and only with acceptance can there be recovery.
inspiration.author: J.K. Rowling

inspiration.quote: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
inspiration.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

inspiration.quote: When life gives you lemons, make lemonade.
inspiration.author: Elbert Hubbard

inspiration.quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
